text: The Wellington cricket team, based at Wellington, the capital of New Zealand, has been active since 1873. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Plunket Shield which they have won 22 times, most recently in 2023â€“24. Their home ground is Basin Reserve in Wellington. The team is known as the Wellington Firebirds in limited overs matches. Category:First-class cricket teams in New Zealand
title: Wellington cricket team
